action.description: Adopted as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Alcos, Hussey, Reyes Oda, Tarnas voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Grandinetti, Iwamoto, Kapela, Muraoka, Poepoe, Souza voting no (6) and  Representative(s) Amato, Belatti, Cochran, Garrett, Ichiyama, Perruso, Quinlan excused (7).
